posts.post_content:
I’m currently hoping to find a number of things! However, I honestly don’t have a bunch of cash to work with SO I’d like to find these items in DEPLORABLE condition!

Torn down the middle, taped back together, written on, altered in any way, etc etc


Please email at [url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url] if you have anything listed. I also have a list of all my items that I could send you to possibly work out a trade….
